name: 12PRESS
tagline: FREE/Open Source meeting and event schedule website with php/mysql for 12 step organizations, etc.
body:
### Welcome to 12Press.

![12Press](http://tonybaldwin.me/images/12press.20150704.png)

12Press is a FREE/Open Source online meeting and event schedule presentation platform designed for 12 Step recovery fellowships (NA, AA, etc.) and similar organizations written in PHP with a MySQL (or MariaDB or Percona) database backend, released according to the [GNU/Affero License](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.en.html)

## Live Examples

There's a [live sample with fake meetings and events here](http://12press.myownsite.me)
and
The [Greater New Haven Area of the CT Region of Narcotics Anonymous is using 12Press here](http://gnhana.info)

### Authors and Contributors
12Press is authored, so far by Tony Baldwin (@tonybaldwin)

### Support or Contact
See @tonybaldwin or [the 12Press Wiki](https://github.com/tonybaldwin/12press/wiki)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
